text: The plasmid encoding anti-viral-sense of MP-12 S-segment at the downstream of the T7 promoter, pProT7-S(+), was described previously [51] . VeroE6 cells were infected with PTV Adames strain or SFSV Sabin strain (provided by Dr. R.B. Tesh, UTMB), and the total RNA was extracted at 3 dpi. First stranded cDNA was synthesized with Superscript II Reverse Transcriptase
